title: Organizational Learning Readiness Assessment Capacity-Building Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners possess mid-level expertise in social sciences, access materials asynchronously via LMS, and complete assignments using personal devices in BYOD settings. They receive continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Explain the four scales of an organizational learning readiness assessment tool: identity/ownership, team/respect, accountability/support, and trust/sustainability
Develop an evaluation tool to analyze organizational learning stages through survey-based research design
Assess the validity of research results by applying ICC and multi-level confirmatory factor analysis concepts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
